page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: This is 11 year old Suzanne Stokes account of what she did on 8th July 1985. I got up at 07:30 and got dressed, washed my sister's hair and had breakfast. I then made my sandwiches for lunch and did the washing-up. At school I did some percentages in maths and then my project. After break I did some English work about Buckingham Palace. Afterwards I saw the Headmaster about some projects. After lunch I finished my English and did some geography, which was about a map, and then went home. I tidied my desk and room at home, read a book and then had some tea. After tea I did some of my individual project, which is about farms. Then I watched television. At 21:00 I went to bed.
